decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Grief, then bringing them back into play with Animate Dead and Reanimate. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while also disrupting their game plan with cards like Daze and Force of Will. The deck also includes some control elements with cards like Brazen Borrower and Wasteland to keep the opponent on their toes.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the opponent's board while applying pressure with efficient creatures and burn spells. By utilizing cards like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent, along with countermagic and removal spells such as Lightning Bolt and Force of Will, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and quickly finish the game. The deck also leverages cards like Wasteland and Mishra's Bauble for additional value and card advantage to maintain the tempo advantage.

This deck focuses on assembling the Doomsday combo quickly and efficiently, utilizing a mixture of card draw, interaction, and mana acceleration to set up a game-winning Thassa's Oracle win condition. The deck includes various tutors, cantrips, and disruptive spells to sculpt the perfect hand and protect the combo from being disrupted. Additionally, it includes cards like Lion's Eye Diamond and Lotus Petal to generate mana quickly, allowing for a fast and powerful combo finish. The key strategy is to sequence your spells carefully to set up Doomsday and win the game in one explosive turn.

This combo Dredge deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with dredge cards to fuel powerful graveyard synergies and enable quick wins through a Thassa's Oracle win-condition or Dread Return combo. The deck utilizes cards like Faithless Looting and Careful Study to rapidly fill the graveyard, while also using Cabal Therapy to disrupt opponents' strategies. With the ability to mill through the deck at a rapid pace, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful graveyard interactions and combos.

This deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana quickly through the use of fast mana cards like Dark Ritual and Lion's Eye Diamond, in order to cast multiple spells in a single turn and eventually win the game with Tendrils of Agony. It also utilizes cards like Entomb and Cabal Therapy to set up the combo and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes ways to recycle spells with Gaea's Will and Echo of Eons, as well as utility lands like Urza's Saga to search for key artifacts.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays and utilizing cards that can quickly deal damage to the opponent, such as Lotus Petal and Goblin Engineer. It also includes cards like Entomb and Goblin Welder to help facilitate graveyard interactions and recur important artifacts. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creatures, artifacts, and spells, while utilizing Urza's Saga to find key pieces of the deck. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy and allow for flexibility in casting spells.

The deck focuses on using artifacts like The One Ring, Mox Opal, and Lotus Petal to ramp up mana quickly, while utilizing cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Mystic Forge to generate value and combo off with cards like Paradox Engine and Manifold Key. The goal is to assemble a powerful board state with powerful artifacts and potentially win the game with a combo finish. The deck is supported by lands like Urza's Workshop, City of Traitors, and Ancient Tomb to provide additional mana acceleration.
